title: Count Lines Matching a Pattern
description: In the file `data/search_me.txt`, find all lines containing the word "important" (case-sensitive) and output only the count of such lines.

setup_files.content:
This is a line.
Another line with important information.
This line is not so important.
Yet another line.
An important notice is here.
Final line, also important.

hints: You'll need to pipe the output of `grep` to another command.
The `wc` command has an option to count lines. Check its man page (`man wc`).
Ensure your `grep` command is case-sensitive and looks for the exact word "important".
